model_overview.problem_type: Problem being solved with the model
model_overview.algorithm_type: Algorithm used to solve the problem
model_overview.model_id: SageMaker Model Arn or Non SageMaker Model id

model_package_details.model_package_description: A brief summary of the model package
model_package_details.model_package_arn: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the model package

created_by.user_profile_name: The name of the user's profile in SageMaker Studio

model_package_details.approval_description: A description provided for the model approval
model_package_details.model_package_group_name: If the model is a versioned model, the name of the model group that the versioned model belongs to.
model_package_details.domain: The machine learning domain of the model package you specified. Common machine learning domains include computer vision and natural language processing.
model_package_details.task: The machine learning task you specified that your model package accomplishes. Common machine learning tasks include object detection and image classification.
model_package_details.source_algorithms: A list of algorithms that were used to create a model package.
model_package_details.inference_specification: Details about inference jobs that can be run with models based on this model package.

business_details.business_problem: What business problem does the model solve?

training_details.objective_function: the objective function the model will optimize for

additional_information.ethical_considerations: Any ethical considerations that the author wants to provide
additional_information.caveats_and_recommendations: Caveats and recommendations for people who might use this model in their applications.
